A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm a mega fan. Read 60+ Expanded Universe books\, addicted to both SW animated Series\, and I freakin love every SW movie- yes even THE PREQUELS. The Last Jedi however is a liberal push to paint fair skinned males as evil\, failures\, and inherently bad in general. #typical.of.them\nThere are so many plots holes that even I can't defend them all.  The fact that Johnson is in charge of the next trilogy installment is terrifying to me.\nThis movie was a huge let down.
